@@ -942,1 +942,1 @@

@@ -944,3 +944,3 @@
-    <Field type="string" name="name" label="Name of Loaded library" />
-    <Field type="boolean" name="success" label="Load success status" description="Success or failure of the load operation" />

+    <Field type="boolean" name="success" label="Success" description="Success or failure of the load operation" />
